data.trans: Tập trung hết sức vào gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy hiện đang tập trung hết sức vào bài kiểm tra đầu vào.
data.en_hint: She's taken up with the entrance exam.
data.content_game_1: She's taken up with the entrance exam.
data.answer_en_hint: She's taken up with the entrance exam.

data.trans: Trở nên nổi tiếng, thăng hoa
data.trans_hint: Sự nghiệp ca hát của anh thăng hoa sau khi xuất hiện trên truyền hình.
data.en_hint: His singing career took off after his TV appearance.
data.content_game_1: His singing career took off after his TV appearance.
data.answer_en_hint: His singing career took off after his TV appearance.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã rất bất ngờ khi một người bạn đã quá lâu không gặp tình cờ vỗ vai tôi trên đường ngày hôm qua.
data.en_hint: I was taken aback when a long lost friend happened to tapped on my shoulder on the street.
data.content_game_1: I was taken aback when a long lost friend happened to tapped on my shoulder on the street.
data.answer_en_hint: I was taken aback when a long lost friend happened to tapped on my shoulder on the street.

data.trans: Đánh bại, hạ ai đó (trong thể thao)
data.trans_hint: Gã đó đánh bại đấu sĩ của chúng ta chỉ sau vài phút của trận đấu.
data.en_hint: The guy took our new fighter apart just after of few minutes of the fight.
data.content_game_1: The guy took our new fighter apart just after of few minutes of the fight.
data.answer_en_hint: The guy took our new fighter apart just after of few minutes of the fight.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã đưa cô ta về vì đêm qua cô tay sau ngoắc cần câu.
data.en_hint: I took her back home as she was absolutely sloshed last night.
data.content_game_1: I took her back home as she was absolutely sloshed last night.
data.answer_en_hint: I took her back home as she was absolutely sloshed last night.

data.trans: Tháo rời, mổ xẻ thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Những đứa trẻ hiếu kỳ thích tháo rời đồ chơi của chúng ra để xem bên trong trông thế nào.
data.en_hint: Curious kids love taking their toys apart to see what looks like inside.
data.content_game_1: Curious kids love taking their toys apart to see what looks like inside.
data.answer_en_hint: Curious kids love taking their toys apart to see what looks like inside.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã gỡ trang web đó xuống vì nó vi phạm các quy định về kiểm duyệt.
data.en_hint: We took that website down as it violated censorship regulations.
data.content_game_1: We took that website down as it violated censorship regulations.
data.answer_en_hint: We took that website down as it violated censorship regulations.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta ghi lại lại một số thông tin quan trọng từ bài phát biểu của khách mời.
data.en_hint: He took some importants notes down from the speech delivered by the guest.
data.content_game_1: He took some importants notes down from the speech delivered by the guest.
data.answer_en_hint: He took some importants notes down from the speech delivered by the guest.

data.trans: Bóp nhỏ quần áo (làm cho nhỏ hơn)
data.trans_hint: Tôi cần phải đem chiếc áo này đi bóp nhỏ lại vì nó quá rộng so với tôi.
data.en_hint: I need to have this dress taken in as it is too big for me.
data.content_game_1: I need to have this dress taken in as it is too big for me.
data.answer_en_hint: I need to have this dress taken in as it is too big for me.

data.trans_hint: Tôi vẫn không hiểu ý cô ấy là gì mặc dù cô ấy đã giải thích rất nhiều lần.
data.en_hint: I still cannot take what she means in though she has explained it to me many times.
data.content_game_1: I still cannot take what she means in though she has explained it to me many times.
data.answer_en_hint: I still cannot take what she means in though she has explained it to me many times.

data.trans: Thảo luận điều gì với ai
data.trans_hint: Anh ta muốn thảo luận điều này với giáo viên chủ nhiệm để tìm ra giải pháp.
data.en_hint: He wants to take this matter up with the form teacher to find out the solution.
data.content_game_1: He wants to take this matter up with the form teacher to find out the solution.
data.answer_en_hint: He wants to take this matter up with the form teacher to find out the solution.

data.trans: Bắt đầu thứ gì như một thói quen
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy bắt đầu việc đi dạo trên biển sau giờ làm như một thói quen.
data.en_hint: She takes to walking on the beach after work.
data.content_game_1: She takes to walking on the beach after work.
data.answer_en_hint: She takes to walking on the beach after work.

data.content: take to something like a duck to water
data.trans: Bắt tay vào việc gì một cách thuận lợi
data.trans_hint: May mắn thay, anh ta bắt tay vào công việc kinh doanh của mình rất thuận lợi và đạt được khá nhiều thành công.
data.en_hint: Fortunately, he took to his business like a duck to water and gained quite many successful achievements.
data.content_game_1: Fortunately, he took to his business like a duck to water and gained quite many successful achievements.
data.answer_en_hint: Fortunately, he took to his business like a duck to water and gained quite many successful achievements.

data.trans_hint: Bạn bè ra sức ngăn cản cô ấy khỏi việc tự tử.
data.en_hint: Her friends were determined to prevent her from taking herself off.
data.content_game_1: Her friends were determined to prevent her from taking herself off.
data.answer_en_hint: Her friends were determined to prevent her from taking herself off.
